text: Flintstone may refer to: * Flint, a type of stone, sometimes erroneously called flintstone * Flintstone, Georgia * Flintstone, Maryland * Flintstone, Tasmania, a locality in Australia * The Flintstones, an animated television show and related productions ** The Flintstones (1988 video game) ** The Flintstones (1993 video game), a 1993 video game based on the animated television show ** The Flintstones (pinball) ** The Flintstones (film), a 1994 live action film based on the animated television show ** Flintstones Chewable Vitamins, supplemental multivitamins for children based on the animated sitcom The Flintstones ** The Flintstones (2016 comic book) ** Flintstonization, a term coined in the book Sex at Dawn regarding the projecting of modern assumptions and beliefs onto earlier societies. ==See also== * Flint (disambiguation)
title: Flintstone
